ygData.subject: Howto check the validity of ARC-files using Heritrix 1.5.1
ygData.msgSnippet: Dear all. The current Heritrix 1.5.1 now breaks one of our unit-tests, that tests for validity of an ARC-file: ARCReader ar = ARCReaderFactory.get(anArc):

Dear all.
The current Heritrix 1.5.1 now breaks one of our unit-tests, that=
 tests for
validity of an ARC-file:

ARCReader ar =3D ARCReaderFactory.get(=
anArc):
assertTrue("ARC-file is invalid", ar.isValid() );

The method isVal=
id() is now protected, so we can no longer validate the
ARC-file in this ma=
nner.
So, what is the suggested method to validate ARC-files?

regards
----=
